title: bazel crashed due to an internal error-Expected internal string with Latin-1 coder

labels.name: P1
labels.description: I'll work on this now. (Assignee required)

labels.name: team-Core
labels.description: Skyframe, bazel query, BEP, options parsing, bazelrc

body:
### Description of the bug:


FATAL: bazel crashed due to an internal error. Printing stack trace:
